channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Beware ‘Vlad the Mad’: Cornered Russian Bears Are Extremely Dangerous
item.description: The West must make clear that Putin cannot win.

item.title: Kamala Harris’s Grand Delusions
item.description: The twice-failed presidential candidate’s book tour is an excruciating reminder of why she lost.

item.title: Restoring Columbus to His Rightful Place
item.description: The White House correctly celebrates the courage, entrepreneurial ambition, religious zeal, and daring that impelled figures like Columbus.

item.title: China Escalates Cyberattacks That Are Increasingly Hard To Detect
item.description: The Trump administration must take decisive action to hold the Chinese government and its affiliated hackers accountable for their cyber activities.

item.title: California’s Gerrymandering Scam Raises Election Integrity Concerns
item.description: Voters have complained about problems with mail-in ballots ahead of the Golden State's referendum on Proposition 50.

item.title: Trump declares 'dawn of a new Middle East' as all 20 living hostages released
item.description: President Trump heralded a seismic shift in the Middle East as he addressed the Israeli parliament on Monday, hours after the final 20 living hostages...

item.title: Netanyahu to award Israel's highest award to Trump
item.description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said Monday that he is awarding President Trump the Israeli Prize, the Jewish state's highest award, which h...

item.title: The Latest FBI Spying Makes Watergate Look Trivial
item.description: The FBI secretly monitored the phone records of eight sitting Republican senators in an abusive fishing expedition done with impunity.

item.title: U.S. stocks rebound after Trump says U.S.-China situation will be 'fine'
item.description: U.S. stocks surged Monday after President Trump tried to cool trade tensions with Chinese President Xi Jinping over the weekend and Treasury Secretary...

item.title: The Biggest Obstacle To Trump’s Israel-Hamas Peace Deal Is Jihadi Ideology
item.description: Despite a new plan, the president’s ultimate ambitions could be threatened by the many challenges inherent to the Gaza conflict.

item.title: Could the Real Christopher Columbus Please Step Forward?
item.description: Let’s return to the genuine Columbus of the Italian immigrants and not to the fictional Columbus of the French revolutionaries and their flat Earth my...

item.title: Trump Is The Best Statesman Of Our Time Because He’s A Realist
item.description: If we are to properly set the conditions for a civilizational rebirth, we must accept that realistic rhetoric is the statecraft needed for renewal.

item.title: Trump jokes about his eternal fate: 'I think I am not maybe heaven-bound'
item.description: President Trump joked Sunday that he might not be destined for the Pearly Gates.

item.title: Neither side flinches as shutdown pain intensifies, thousands of federal workers lose their jobs
